analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika dassana hetu ttika

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca a nidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na sani dassana sa paṭigham na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca

original: sanidassanasappaṭigho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa
